dcterms:description: A legal case retrieval dataset for the Chinese law system, containing 107 queries and 43,000 candidate case documents.
dcterms:title: LeCaRD

dcterms:description: A Chinese legal case retrieval dataset provided as the test set for the CAIL2022 legal case retrieval competition, comprising 130 queries and 13,000 candidate cases.
dcterms:title: CAIL2022-LCR

dcterms:creator: Mi-Young Kim
Juliano Rabelo
Randy Goebel
Masaharu Yoshioka
Yoshinobu Kano
Ken Satoh
dcterms:description: An English dataset serving as the official dataset for COLIEE2022 Task 1, consisting of a training set with 898 queries and 3,531 candidate cases, and a test set with 300 queries and 1,263 candidate cases.
dcterms:title: COLIEE2022

dcterms:creator: Randy Goebel
Yoshinobu Kano
Mi-Young Kim
Juliano Rabelo
Ken Satoh
Masaharu Yoshioka
dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating legal case retrieval techniques in the COLIEE2023 competition, containing 959 query cases against 4,400 candidate cases for training and 319 query cases against 1,335 candidate cases for testing.
dcterms:title: COLIEE2023
